application_notes.chemical_processing: Designed for chemical processing applications with aggressive media. All wetted components selected for chemical compatibility.
application_notes.food_beverage: FDA compliant materials and construction. 3-A sanitary standards compliance available. CIP/SIP compatible design.
application_notes.hazardous_locations: Certified for use in Class I Div 1 and Div 2 hazardous locations. FM and CSA approved.
application_notes.general_industrial: Designed for industrial level measurement applications with standard environmental conditions.

material_notes.S: 316 Stainless Steel construction provides excellent corrosion resistance for most industrial applications. Suitable for temperatures up to 750°F and pressures up to 3000 PSI.
material_notes.H: HALAR (ECTFE) coating provides superior chemical resistance to acids, bases, and organic solvents. Temperature range: -100°F to 350°F. Pressure rating: 1500 PSI maximum.
material_notes.A: Alloy 20 construction provides excellent resistance to sulfuric acid and other aggressive chemicals. Temperature range: -100°F to 400°F.
material_notes.HC: Hastelloy C-276 provides exceptional resistance to oxidizing and reducing acids, including nitric, sulfuric, and hydrochloric acids.
material_notes.TT: Titanium construction provides excellent corrosion resistance in oxidizing environments and seawater applications.

installation_notes.standard: Mount vertically with minimum 1" clearance from tank wall. Ensure proper grounding for electrical safety.
installation_notes.hazardous: Explosion-proof installation must be performed by qualified personnel. Follow all applicable safety codes.
installation_notes.sanitary: Use sanitary fittings and ensure proper cleaning procedures. Follow 3-A sanitary standards.

maintenance_notes.standard: Annual calibration recommended. Inspect for damage or wear during routine maintenance.
maintenance_notes.hazardous: Special maintenance procedures required for explosion-proof installations. Follow manufacturer guidelines.
maintenance_notes.sanitary: Regular cleaning and sanitization required. Follow FDA and 3-A maintenance procedures.

safety_notes.standard: Follow all applicable safety codes and regulations. Ensure proper electrical grounding.
safety_notes.hazardous: Explosion-proof installation must be performed by qualified personnel. Follow Class I Div 1 requirements.
safety_notes.high_pressure: High-pressure applications require special attention to pressure ratings and installation procedures.
